${ModID}:Augment.NAME: Augment
${ModID}:Augment.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have no empty Orb slots, gain 1 Orb slot.
${ModID}:Augment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you have no empty Orb slots, gain 1 Orb slot.

${ModID}:Allocate.NAME: Allocate
${ModID}:Allocate.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot for each enemy in combat.
${ModID}:Allocate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 Orb slot for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
${ModID}:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL If it was a Power card, Channel !M! Plasma. Otherwise, Channel !M! Lightning.

${ModID}:IcicleCrash.NAME: Icicle Crash
${ModID}:IcicleCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! Frost for each empty Orb slot.

${ModID}:Charge.NAME: Charge
${ModID}:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger the passive abilities of your Channeled Orbs.

${ModID}:MaterialBoost.NAME: Material Boost
${ModID}:MaterialBoost.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Evoke your next Orb once for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Thunderstruck.NAME: Thunderstruck
${ModID}:Thunderstruck.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card containing "Strike", Channel !M! Lightning.
